comparisonSection.alibaba:
Alibaba is the world’s largest, but competition is overwhelming, making it difficult to stand out. 
High costs also make ROI hard to evaluate.
comparisonSection.yellow: Yellow Pages  is simple but weak in translation and negotiation support, and often suffer from spam emails.
comparisonSection.globy: Globy is simple but weak in translation and negotiation support, and often suffer from spam emails
comparisonSection.shopify: Shopify is excellent for building online stores but not designed for B2B matching.
comparisonSection.gmajor:
GMAJOR provides a system where Vietnamese companies 
can be easily discovered by international buyers, with special focus on Japan, the US, and China.

faq1.question: Does registration cost anything?
faq1.answer: Registration and product listing are free of charge.

faq2.question: What if we don’t speak Japanese or English?
faq2.answer: Automatic translation enables smooth communication in Japanese, English, and Vietnamese.

faq3.question: What kind of companies are registered?
faq3.answer: Primarily Japanese manufacturers, food companies, and trading firms, as well as US and Chinese buyers.

faq4.question: Will inquiries from abroad come immediately?
faq4.answer: It depends on your industry and products, but relevant inquiries can arrive very quickly.

faq5.question: Do you provide negotiation support?
faq5.answer: Yes, optional support services by local specialists are available.

featuresCarousel.solution: Bringing international market expansion solutions for Vietnamese businesses

globalConnection.title: Direct connection with global businesses
globalConnection.desc: Japanese, American, Vietnamese, and Chinese companies (suppliers, factories, expansion-oriented firms) are already registered, creating a gateway for Vietnamese businesses to go global.

translation.title: Automatic multilingual translation
translation.desc: Write in Vietnamese, and it will automatically be translated into Japanese or English for seamless communication.

negotiation.title: Matchmaking that leads to real negotiations
negotiation.desc: GMAJOR is “not just registration.” By listing products or services, you access practical functions that bring you closer to real business results.

freePosting.title: Free product/service listing with zero risk
freePosting.desc: Simply list your products or services and start receiving inquiries from abroad.

aiOptimization.title: AI-powered product description generation
aiOptimization.desc: Without special knowledge, create optimized product descriptions for global markets using just a few keywords.

pricing.title: All basic functions are free, paid plans remain affordable
pricing.desc:
Developed specifically for SMEs, GMAJOR offers all basic functions free of charge. Affordable paid plans are also available to fit environments where internal approval is difficult to obtain.
→ Now is the perfect time to increase your company’s international exposure.

comparisonTable.heading: The difference lies in the relevance
comparisonTable.subtext:
GMAJOR is not the only option. Many global B2B platforms exist, each with strengths and weaknesses.
 Here is a comparison from the perspective of practicality for Vietnamese companies.

We received direct inquiries from a

translation feature, communication was 
smooth and worry-free.

We wanted to bring our coffee to overseas 
markets but struggled to find buyers. 
Through GMAJOR, we signed a direct 
contract with a US buyer.
